CustomField.formula: IF(OR(AND(TEXT( StageName )="Perdida", Valid_Perdida__c =true, Validar_Raz_n_adicional__c =true),AND(TEXT( StageName )="Perdida", Valid_Perdida__c =true, Validar_Raz_n_adicional__c =false),AND(TEXT( StageName )="Perdida", Valid_Perdida__c =false, Validar_Raz_n_adicional__c =true)),true,false)
CustomField.label: Perdida
